column3: p. 24</ref> was a  name given by the [[Noldoli]] to [[Tuor|Tuor's]] dwelling place near [[Mithrim]]. The floor of the cove was white sand; the walls were embellished by Tuor with animals
column5: trees and flowers. His favourite carving was a swan
column6: which eventually became the emblem of his house. Tuor dwelt there for a while
column7: until Ulmo appointed him with the mission to reach [[Gondolin]].<ref>{{LT2|III}}
